patthana23.37:1.1_0: Naajjhattaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā bahiddhā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.37:1.1_1: Nabahiddhā nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhatto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.37:2.1_0: Naajjhattaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā bahiddhā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.37:2.1_1: Nabahiddhā naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhatto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.37:3.1_0: Naajjhattaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.37:3.1_1: Nabahiddhā naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.37:3.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
